pagetitle: "Welcome to our documentation"
page-layout: full
sidebar: false

resources:

listing:
  - id: developer
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 1
    max-description-length: 250
    sort: false
    fields: [title, description]
    image-height: 250px
    contents:
      - path: get-started/quickstart-developer.qmd
        # image: assets/img/developer-diagram.png
  - id: validator
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 1
    max-description-length: 250
    sort: false
    fields: [title, description]
    image-height: 250px
    contents:
      - path: get-started/quickstart-validator.qmd
        # image: assets/img/validator-diagram.png
  - id: admin
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 1
    max-description-length: 250
    sort: false
    fields: [title, description]
    image-height: 250px
    contents:
      - path: get-started/quickstart-administrator.qmd
        # image: assets/img/admin-diagram.png
  - id: releases
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 3
    max-description-length: 150
    sort: false
    fields: [title, description]
    contents:
      - 2024-dec-06/release-notes.qmd
      - 2024-oct-22/release-notes.qmd
      - 2024-sep-25/release-notes.qmd
      - 2024-sep-09/release-notes.qmd
      - 2024-aug-13/release-notes.qmd
      - 2024-jul-22/release-notes.qmd
  - id: validmind-academy
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 1
    image-height: 350px
    sort: false
    contents:
    - path: training/training.qmd
      # image: assets/img/hero-platform.png
      title: "ValidMind Academy {{< fa graduation-cap >}}"
      subtitle: "Learn by doing {{< fa chevron-right >}}"
